oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sophie Tucker - MG 20035 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Content is identical to side 1 of Mercury release MG 20035. Featuring narration and performances by Sophie Tucker, narration by Mason Adams, an orchestra led by Harry Geller, with pianist Ted Shapiro. Copyright Mercury Record Corp., 1950.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sophie Tucker

Lee (Sophie Tucker) -- Sophie Tucker biographical dramatization (Sophie Tucker, Mason Adams) -- What Do You Want To Make Those Eyes At Me For (Sophie Tucker) -- Sophie Tucker biographical dramatization (Sophie Tucker, Mason Adams) -- Darktown Strutters' Ball (Sophie Tucker) -- Sophie Tucker biographical dramatization (Sophie Tucker, Mason Adams) -- My Yiddishe Momme (Sophie Tucker) -- Sophie Tucker biographical dramatization (Sophie Tucker, Mason Adams) -- If He's Good Enough To Fight (Sophie Tucker) -- Sophie Tucker biographical dramatization (Sophie Tucker, Mason Adams) -- Some Of These Days (Sophie Tucker)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tucker, Sophie, 1884-1966; Adams, Mason; Geller, Harry; Shapiro, Ted
